Lubbock.South Plains Mall: South Plains Mall is a 1,200,000-square-foot (110,000 m2) shopping mall located in Lubbock, Texas. It is located at the southwest corner of Loop 289 and Slide Road. The mall was opened in 1972 with an initial square footage of 846,000 square feet (78,600 m2) at a cost of $25 million.
